title: Aluminum Fencing Fayetteville, NC & Sanford | Ornamental | RWF
description: Elegant aluminum fencing in Fayetteville and Sanford, NC. Rust-free ornamental iron alternatives. Perfect for pools and property lines.
keywords: Aluminum fencing, Ornamental Fence, Metal Fencing, Pool Fencing, Privacy Inserts, Fayetteville Fencing, Sanford Fencing, Lillington Fencing

headings.text: Aluminum Fence Installation in Fayetteville & Sanford

serviceOptions.title: Classical Ornamental
serviceOptions.description: Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication with clean lines and timeless designs. The look of wrought iron without the rust.

serviceOptions.title: Pool Fencing
serviceOptions.description: Keep your pool area safe and compliant with local regulations while maintaining high visibility and a stylish look.

serviceOptions.title: Privacy Inserts
serviceOptions.description: Add decorative privacy panels to your aluminum fence for added seclusion without compromising on elegance.

serviceOptions.title: Custom Gates
serviceOptions.description: Enhance access points with custom aluminum gates that provide security and curb appeal.

benefits.title: Rust-Free Durability
benefits.description: Unlike iron or steel, aluminum naturally resists rust and corrosion, making it ideal for our humid North Carolina climate.

benefits.title: Low-Maintenance
benefits.description: Enjoy the beauty of metal fencing without the hassle of painting or staining. A simple wash is all it needs.

benefits.title: Security & Strength
benefits.description: Strong enough to secure your property while being lightweight. Perfect for keeping pets and children safe.

benefits.title: Eco-Friendly
benefits.description: Often made from recycled materials, aluminum fencing is an environmentally conscious choice for your home.

faqs.question: Does aluminum fencing rust?
faqs.answer: No, aluminum is a non-ferrous metal, meaning it does not rust. This makes it superior to traditional wrought iron for our region.

faqs.question: Is aluminum fencing strong enough for dogs?
faqs.answer: Yes, aluminum fences are very sturdy and the vertical pickets are spaced to prevent most pets from squeezing through.

faqs.question: Can I install aluminum fencing on uneven ground?
faqs.answer: Yes, aluminum fence panels are rackable, meaning they can adjust to follow the slope of your land without leaving large gaps.
